channel.title: slackbot on Vishwa Shah
channel.description: Recent content in slackbot on Vishwa Shah

item.title: @vpfbot
item.description: Scheduled Messages constructing a weekly update message based on a Google Sheet CSPON Updates: [a week ago] - [yesterday] Sales Closed - HELL YEA! Congrats! Company | @director | Date Wins - YAY! Good news :) Remember to see these all the way through! Company | @director | Date Losses - It happens. Please remember to fill out insights from this contact in the sheet. Onwards!
